examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地努力，就一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in our efforts, we will surely be able to realize our dreams.

examples.example: 通过不断努力，他最终取得了令人瞩目的成就。

translate.english: Through continuous efforts, he finally achieved remarkable achievements.

examples.example: 只要努力向前，我们就能拥抱更美好的未来。

translate.english: As long as we strive forward, we can embrace a better future.
